segments.text: Oh my, look at those kids trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing something similar when I was a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely oblivious to the kids' antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get caught before they get their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it might tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they're careful and don't hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene brings back so many childhood memories.
segments.speaker: PAR
